item.title: Changing teleports
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Packet 185 is located in ClickingMost.java. Also the ActionButton ID is where you left click something and it gives the ID for the interface/button you clicked in the out printed line in the CMD. Just make the button/interface do something.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing teleports
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Find the ActionButton ID for the rock crab teleport, and then find it in packet 185, then change where it teles you. Also go into TextHandler.java to change what the text says.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing teleports
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:10, topic:246983”]The coords it teles you to, E.G:

case 4150: // catherby teleport c.triggerTele(NEWXCOORD, NEWYCOORD, NEWHEIGHLEVEL); break;
Just edit the coords.[/quote]

item.title: Changing teleports
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

The coords it teles you to, E.G:

case 4150: // catherby teleport c.triggerTele(NEWXCOORD, NEWYCOORD, NEWHEIGHLEVEL); break;
Just edit the coords.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing teleports
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

Im useing deltascape source and i want to switch the teleports from the fight pit view to the 1 that the pk teleports have plz help!

is this want i need to edit? and how would i edit it

case 50245: // edgeville teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Which wild zone?", 2470); c.sendQuest("Edgeville", 2471); c.sendQuest("Varrock", 2472); c.sendQuest("Mage bank", 2473); c.sendFrame164(2469); break; case 4150: // catherby teleport c.triggerTele(2809, 3439, 0); break; case 73144: case 51005: // catherby teleport c.triggerTele(2809, 3439, 0); break; case 73120: case 6004: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("Cave", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break; case 51013: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("Cave", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break; case 73116: case 6005: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight pits", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2; break; case 51023: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight pits", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2; break;

Read full topic
